hero.description: As a developer with 3+ years’ experience, I like exploring new technologies and building intuitive solutions that help people solve problems.

headers.aboutMeQuote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.

aboutMe.quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
aboutMe.bioDescription1: Hi! I’m a full-stack web and mobile developer with over 3 years of experience. Passionate about emerging technologies, especially the impact of artificial intelligence on everyday life, I enjoy building useful, sustainable solutions while trying out exciting new tools.
aboutMe.bioDescription2: Recently, I led the replacement of the synchronization system between a mobile app and a client’s platform over a three month period, which reduced support tickets by 20% and improved the user experience.
aboutMe.bioDescription3: I place great importance on accessibility, testability, and readable code. If you’re looking for a collaborator who can bring your projects to life, don’t hesitate to contact me!
aboutMe.hobby1Description: I love playing Smash Bros with my friends. The strategy and adaptability needed to compete keep the game exciting and entertaining.
aboutMe.hobby2Description: I love playing music I enjoy on my guitar. The time and focus required to learn each song sharpen my concentration and attention to detail.
aboutMe.hobby3Description: Hackathons push me to think creatively, code efficiently, and collaborate effectively with others.
